last_episode_to_air.name: Everything Will Be Fine
last_episode_to_air.overview: After Andrea is found, Ruy, Julia and Fausto come to an understanding. Idalia talks about quitting and going back to Salazar to live with her family.

name: Everything Will Be Fine
overview: A separated couple live together for their child's sake in this satirical dramedy about what it means to be a good parent and spouse in today's world.

episodes.name: Ortiburcio
episodes.overview: Ruy and Julia are great parents but have hit a wall as a couple. When Julia lands in jail after duly driving a drunk Ruy home, she has a revelation.

episodes.name: La Odio
episodes.overview: Everything comes to a head at Andrea's birthday party, after a shaken Ruy discovers the truth behind Julia's Saturday night visits to her mom's home.

episodes.name: Black Rooster
episodes.overview: While Julia spends an afternoon with Fausto, Ruy investigates. Meanwhile, Andrea, who longs for the black rooster next door, becomes an entrepreneur.

episodes.name: #Me Too
episodes.overview: During a radio roundtable, Ruy boasts about being a feminist and gets called out. Listening, Julia is horrified and rushes to get Andrea from school.

episodes.name: Salazar
episodes.overview: When it's time for Ruy and Julia's divorce hearing, they send Andrea to Idalia's rural hometown, where she experiences a different rhythm of life.

episodes.name: Feminine / Masculine
episodes.overview: Word of Julia's corporate win undermines her reputation as an independent artist and cuts into her business. Ruy attends a workshop to unlearn machismo.

episodes.name: The Night
episodes.overview: Upset by the effects of her parents' uncoupling, Andrea runs away — forcing Ruy and Julia to team up to find her. Fausto joins them for a long night.

episodes.name: Everything Will Be Fine
episodes.overview: After Andrea is found, Ruy, Julia and Fausto come to an understanding. Idalia talks about quitting and going back to Salazar to live with her family.
